PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2020-08252020-10-23,  ,  HC,  AAFC,  ,  , 
ActFertilizers Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Fertilizers Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the FERTILIZERS REGULATIONS in order to (1) align pre-market regulatory oversight with the risk profile of the product; (2) facilitate market access for safe and innovative fertilizers and supplements; (3) reduce regulatory scrutiny for low risk fertilizers and supplement; (4) require that fertilizers and supplements with higher or unknown risks be subject to registration (even if previously exempt); and (5) require product proponents to either prepare and keep records that demonstrate how the product meets the exemption criteria and the prescribed safety standards, or disclose this information on the product label.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2020-0232 Publication Date: 2020-11-11
AttachmentsAttachment
